text: Ara ai praciratiâ€”seti chila nagarabasi du'i iyatima kisorera ebam era nice ache tadera guptadhana [1] ara tadera pita chila satkarmaparayana [2]. Kaje'i apanara raba tadera prati dayaparabasa haye icche karalena ye, tara bayahprapta hoka ebam tara tadera dhanabhandara ud'dhara karuka. Ara ami nija theke kichu karini; apani ye bisaye dhairya dharane aparaga hayechilena, eta'i tara byakhya
